headline: Marjorie Taylor Greene Loads Up On Six-Figure Treasury Bill— Diversifies Portfolio With Bitcoin ETF, Tech Stocks
summary: Rep. Marjorie Taylor Greene (R-Ga.) made a significant six-figure investment into a U.S. Treasury Bill in mid-September, anchoring a flurry of trading activity that also saw her purchase shares in popular technology stocks and a Bitcoin ETF. The ...

headline: Seismic Welcomes Rob Tarkoff, Former Oracle and Adobe Executive, as Chief Executive Officer
summary: SAN DIEGO, October 01, 2025--Seismic announced the appointment of Rob Tarkoff to Chief Executive Officer. Tarkoff assumes the role from co-founder Doug Winter, who is retiring.

headline: 3D Digital Asset Market Surges to $51.8 billion by 2029 - Dominated by Autodesk (US), Siemens (Germany), Adobe (US)
summary: Delray Beach, FL, Oct. 01, 2025 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- According to MarketsandMarkets™, the 3D Digital Asset Market is expected to grow from USD 28.3 billion by 2024 to USD 51.8 billion by 2029 at a Compound Annual Growth Rate (CAGR) of 12.9% during the forecast period. Increasing demand for virtual and augmented reality experiences, advancements in 3D modeling technology, the rise of the metaverse, and the growing use of 3D assets in gaming, entertainment, and e-commerce industries will drive this

headline: Further to Speak Alongside Adobe and PMG on Data Collaboration Panel at Advertising Week 2025
